product.name: Connectivity technology
product.description: Defines the method of data transfer in a product, e.g. Bluetooth, USB

product.name: Activity tracker design
product.description: Specifies how the activity tracker is worn, e.g. clip on, armband

product.name: Biometric monitor accessory features
product.description: Identifies special functions of biometric monitor accessories, like heart rate monitor or pedometer

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped
